text: Fang Yee is extremely friendly and professional. With his assistance I managed to overcome my injuries. I will highly recommend people who has sports injury to come over to physio & sole clinic for help.

Toto was my podiatrist and helped treat the warts on my foot. My treatment required three sessions in total, and now that my foot has fully healed, I couldnâ€™t be happier! :)

Before starting, Toto and his team reviewed a photo of my condition and provided helpful information. I thought it was corns at first but they explained that it was warts instead. During the first session, he thoroughly explained what warts are and how the procedure works, which reassured me and boosted my confidence. His calm and friendly approach made the entire process smooth and stress-free.

I highly recommend him to anyone in need of a podiatrist!

Toto was friendly, genuine and was attentive to my needs. He was gentle in providing the needed treatment in my plantar warts treatment. In addition, he was also responsive to my questions through whatsapp. I would say with 100% confidence that Toto is the podiatrist to go to for your plantar warts treatment!

Ee Laine at Physio and Sole Clinic (Jurong) is greatly helpful for my daughter. I brought my daughter there to troubleshoot her low arch and pronation of her feet. Ee Laine was very patient, detailed and explained a lot of things to us. Ending off with very useful exercises for her to do at home. Also teaching us on things to look out for before deciding on the next step.

Dr Toto is an incredible physician, friendly and his warmth demeanour makes you feel like meeting an old friend. Ensures you get the best treatment possible at your own discretion as he will discuss with you beforehand and let you decide. Highly recommended with a great clinic atmosphere and friendly staffs! Thank you and happy holidays!
